overview: Wrong way of love stalker. A man is deceived by the wrong way of love, which keeps clinging to him even if he doesn't like it and eventually leads to a crime rather than love. Jin-ah, who is stalking the man Dong-hyeon, thinks she has the man, but the truth is revealed in the end, and everyone loses. Young-min, who watches the two, also breaks down as he watches the other people get ruined for his own greed. In the end, because of his desires, he despairs of a relationship that will never come true...
title: Addiction
